T03D3806:228a-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a ko sha ta la n'a ma /
T03D3806:228a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi lde mig ces bya ba /
T03D3806:228a-5: rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal nas //
T03D3806:228a-6: bla ma'i zhal gyi gdams pa ni //
T03D3806:228a-7: bdag nyid dran nyams 'jigs spang phyir //
T03D3806:228a-8: lung bzhin du ni dgod par bya //
T03D3806:228a-9: zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don bzhi ste /
T03D3806:228a-10: spyir rnam par gzhag pa dgod pa dang bcas pa bstan pa dang /
T03D3806:228a-11: brjod par bya ba'i don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang /
T03D3806:228a-12: mtshon par byed pa'i dpe brgya rtsa brgyad bstan pa dang /
T03D3806:228a-13: rjod byed tshigs su bcad pa sum brgya phul gdab pa'o //
T03D3806:228a-14: de las dang po yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
T03D3806:228a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa /
T03D3806:228a-16: chos thams cad kyi mchog /'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi gshegs shul /
T03D3806:228a-17: bde skyid thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod /
T03D3806:228a-18: dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman /
T03D3806:228b-0: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'i dka' zlog @228b chen po /
T03D3806:228b-1: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i shes rab kyi nyi ma /
T03D3806:228b-2: yon tan brjod kyis mi lang ba 'di la chos
T03D3806:228b-3: sku spros pa thams cad dang bral ba cir yang
T03D3806:228b-4: ma grub kyang / gzugs sku snang ba dag pa
T03D3806:228b-5: la cir yang shar bas mngon par rtogs pa'i snang
T03D3806:228b-6: ma grub kyang / ba'o // mngon rtogs la brgyad
T03D3806:228b-7: las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'khor los sgyur
T03D3806:228b-8: ba'i rgyal po'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-9: lam shes khrus mkhan dri ma dag par byed pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-10: gzhi shes zhing pa so nam byed pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-11: rnam kun mngon rdzogs ded dpon nor bu rin po che 'don pa'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-12: rtse mo mngon rtogs sman pa mkhas pa nad pa gso ba'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-13: mthar gyis pa ma mdzangs mas bu chung gso ba'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-14: skad cig ma'i mngon par rtogs pa zo chun rgyud mo'i dpe'i sgo nas bstan /
T03D3806:228b-15: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni nam mkha'i char sprin gyi dpe'i sgo nas bstan to //
T03D3806:228b-16: don dam pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ni mtshon du med pa nam mkha'i dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-17: kun rdzob kyi snang ba 'khrul pa'i dpe brgyad kyis bstan /
T03D3806:228b-18: grangs la nges pa med pa skyes bu'i tshe tshad kyi dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-19: go rims la nges pa med pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-20: ngo bo la des pa med pa sprul pa'i mi lus kyi dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-21: chos thams cad tshul gcig tu ston pa shing rnams kyi grib ma'i dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-22: zlos pa yod kyang skyon med pa tha ga pas thag 'thags [*'thag?] pa'i dpes bstan /
T03D3806:228b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi'i rnam
T03D3806:228b-24: par gzhag pa dgos pa dang bcas pa 'byed pa'i
T03D3806:228b-27: // / brjod par bya ba'i don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skabs brgyad las /
T03D3806:228b-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa chos bcu'i bdag nyid
T03D3806:228b-29: ni byang chub kyi sems lta spyod gnyis kyis nyams
T03D3806:228b-30: su len pa'o // de la sems bskyed ni byang chub kyi ye shes kyi bsam pa /
T03D3806:228b-31: ched ni byang chub kyi sems kyi 'jug pa /
T03D3806:228b-32: nges par 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems mthar thug pa ste bsams pa bzhin mthar phyin pa'o //
T03D3806:228b-33: lta ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o //
T03D3806:229a-0: de bstan pa'i cha nas ni gdams ngag go / rang bzhin med pa @229a * //
T03D3806:229a-1: de blos rtogs pa'i cha nas ni nges 'byed /
T03D3806:229a-2: byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpar yang mi
T03D3806:229a-3: dmigs par rtogs pas rigs can gyi rten gang zag
T03D3806:229a-4: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dge mi
T03D3806:229a-5: dge la sogs pa dmigs pa bcu gcig / de
T03D3806:229a-6: byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3806:229a-7: phyin pa la spyod pas mi dmigs par rtogs pas
T03D3806:229a-8: dmigs pa'o // spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go bgos pa ni go cha /
T03D3806:229a-9: sbyin pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi lam du 'gro ba ni 'jug pa /
T03D3806:229a-10: drug po de tshogs su 'gro ba ni tshogs te /
T03D3806:229a-11: bcu po de gsum du bsdus te byang chub kyi sems su bsdus pa'o //
T03D3806:229a-12: lam shes la chos bzhi ste /
T03D3806:229a-16: mnyam gzhag ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa des gang la yang mi gnas pa /
T03D3806:229a-17: gang la yang mi slob pa /
T03D3806:229a-18: gang yang btsal na mi rnyed pa /
T03D3806:229a-20: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T03D3806:229a-21: rjes thob ni rang yang yum la mos pa byed /
T03D3806:229a-22: gzhan yang byed du 'jug / byed pa la rjes su yi rang /
T03D3806:229a-23: byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba'o //
T03D3806:229a-24: phan yon ni mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i phan yon dang /
T03D3806:229a-25: rgyud la nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon dang gnyis so //
T03D3806:229a-26: rten gyi gang zag ni lam rnam par dag pa skye ba dang mi skye ba'o //
T03D3806:229a-27: de yang lam shes kyi chos bcu gcig rten gyi
T03D3806:229a-28: gang zag gcig gis mnyam gzhag rjes thob gnyis kyis
T03D3806:229a-29: nyams su blangs pas phan yon 'byung ba'o //
T03D3806:229a-32: 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa thob
T03D3806:229a-33: par byed pa'i thabs shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3806:229a-34: phyin pa'i lta bsgom spyod pa rgyud la brten pas
T03D3806:229a-35: spang bya nyon mongs pa la sogs pa 'gag pa
T03D3806:229a-37: byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi shes 'khor ba rang bzhin
T03D3806:229a-38: med par shes pas mtha' gnyis gang la yang mi
T03D3806:229a-39: gnas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
T03D3806:229a-40: lta ba spyod pa 'bras bu gsum mtshan mar mi
T03D3806:229a-41: 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin med pas gzugs dang
T03D3806:229a-42: gzugs kyi rgyud gang la yang mi sbyor /
T03D3806:229a-43: rnam pa gang gis kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa'o //
T03D3806:229a-44: gzhi shes kyi chos dgu 'khor ba rang bzhin med
T03D3806:229a-45: par shes pas bdag nyid der mi zhen par sems
T03D3806:229b-0: @229b can la 'chi 'pho la sogs pa bstan pa'o
T03D3806:229b-1: // rnam kun mngon rdzogs ni zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis so //
T03D3806:229b-2: zab pa ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa gang la yang mi brtson //
T03D3806:229b-3: sbyor bas chos sku srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid do //
T03D3806:229b-4: rnam pa rgya che ba ni sbyor ba la phan yon gyi rnam pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-6: sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-7: sbyor ba nyams su len par byed pa'i thabs tha
T03D3806:229b-8: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lngas thar pa'i
T03D3806:229b-9: cha mthun gyi rnam pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-10: sdig pa spang zhing dge ba sgrub pa nges par 'byed pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-11: sbyor ba mthar phyin ma phyin rtags kyi rnam pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-12: sbyor ba'i phan yon zhing dag pa thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam pa'o//
T03D3806:229b-13: rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi chos bcu gcig phung po
T03D3806:229b-14: la sogs pa gang la yang mi gnas pa rgyud
T03D3806:229b-15: la sbyar bas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rnam
T03D3806:229b-16: par 'char ba'o // rtse mo mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3806:229b-17: ni rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi sbyor ba las bogs
T03D3806:229b-18: phyung ba las rtags bcu gnyis /
T03D3806:229b-19: dge ba'i rnam pa bcu drug 'phel /
T03D3806:229b-21: sems kun du gnas pa'i sbyor lam gyi rtse mo'o //
T03D3806:229b-22: mthong lam bsgom lam bar chad med pa gsum ni mnyam gzhag la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-24: mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni pha rol tu phyin
T03D3806:229b-25: pa drug shes rab kyis zin nas rtogs pa la
T03D3806:229b-26: skyed 'byung ba'o // mthar gyis pa ni chos thams
T03D3806:229b-27: cad mi dmigs pas pha rol tu phyin pa rim
T03D3806:229b-28: skyed 'byung ba'o // gyis 'char ba'o // skad cig
T03D3806:229b-29: ma ni chos thams cad rang bzhin med pas pha
T03D3806:229b-30: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa cig car du
T03D3806:229b-31: skyed 'byung ba'o // gyis 'char ba'o // rdzogs pa'o
T03D3806:229b-32: // skabs tha ma ni chos thams cad rang bzhin
T03D3806:229b-34: de rnams kyi don yang bsdu na kun rdzob dang /
T03D3806:229b-36: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T03D3806:229b-37: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-39: thabs kyi cha thams cad ni kun rdzob bo //
T03D3806:229b-40: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-43: skye med la sogs pa dang /
T03D3806:229b-44: rnam par mi rtog pa ni don dam pa'o //
T03D3806:229b-45: bden pa gnyis kyang ltos nas bzhag pa las ngo bos sgrub pa ni med de /
T03D3806:229b-53: 'dzin pa la sogs pa gnyis dang /
T03D3806:229b-54: gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad don la dbyer
T03D3806:229b-55: med yin gyi du ma ro gcig shes par gyis
T03D3806:230a-1: don gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig ste gnyis pa'o /
T03D3806:230a-3: // / mtshon par byed pa'i dpe brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstan pa las /
T03D3806:230a-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpe lnga las dang po ni /
T03D3806:230a-5: chu klung ji snyed yod pa thams cad klu'i bdag
T03D3806:230a-6: po ma dros pa'i mthu yin pa'i dpes shes rab
T03D3806:230a-7: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sangs rgyas nyag gcig
T03D3806:230a-9: nyan thos dang rang rgyal so so skye bo rnams
T03D3806:230a-10: la snang bas byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma chad
T03D3806:230a-11: par bstan / sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan
T03D3806:230a-12: du mi byed pa'i dpes byang chub sems dpa' shes
T03D3806:230a-13: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
T03D3806:230a-14: bden brdzun dbyer med par bstan /
T03D3806:230a-15: rdza so ma btang bar chus reg pa'i dpes thabs
T03D3806:230a-16: mi mkhas pa'i gang zag sdig pa'i grogs pos zin
T03D3806:230a-18: sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul nas dmyal ba
T03D3806:230a-19: dang pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i dpes byang
T03D3806:230a-20: chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3806:230a-21: pa la spyod pas 'jigs pa dang zhen pa ni
T03D3806:230a-22: skye bar bstan / mi shi de'i 'gro rgyu med
T03D3806:230a-23: pa'i dpes bud shing las me logs su ma grub
T03D3806:230a-24: pas 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pa las
T03D3806:230a-25: mya ngan las 'das pa 'gro rgyu med par bstan
T03D3806:230a-26: skye bar bstan / no // lam shes la dpe bcu dgu las /
T03D3806:230a-27: dang po 'dren pa 'dus ma byas la mi gnas
T03D3806:230a-28: zhes pas sangs rgyas gang la yang mi gnas pa'i
T03D3806:230a-29: dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
T03D3806:230a-30: la yang mi gnas par bstan /
T03D3806:230a-31: tshu rol pha rol 'gro ngogs ma mthong zhes pas
T03D3806:230a-32: mtha' ma mthong ba'i bya'i dpes yum la spyod pa'i
T03D3806:230a-33: byang chub sems dpa' rtag chad kyi mtha' mi mthong
T03D3806:230a-34: bar bstan / chos 'chad pa dang nyan pa nas
T03D3806:230a-35: bzung nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar sgyu ma
T03D3806:230a-36: lta bur bstan pa'i dpes nyan pa la sogs pa
T03D3806:230a-37: nas 'khrul snang du shes na de nyid sgom pa
T03D3806:230a-38: bar bstan / yin par bstan / nam mkha'i khams
T03D3806:230a-39: dang mtshungs te dbyer med tha dad med pa'i dpes
T03D3806:230a-40: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos dang shes rab kyi pha
T03D3806:230a-41: rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med pas gcig dang
T03D3806:230a-42: tha dad du ma grub pas btsal na mi rnyed
T03D3806:230a-43: bar bstan / yin par bstan / par bstan to // mos pa'i dpe bdun ni /
T03D3806:230a-44: rig sngags chen po'i dpes mya ngan sdug bsngal gyi chos zhi ba dang /
T03D3806:230a-45: sman pa'i rgyal po'i dpes nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi ba dang /
T03D3806:230a-46: sa bon btab nas sa la myu gu 'byung ba'i
T03D3806:230b-0: dpes shes rab kyis dge @230b ba'i lo tog thams
T03D3806:230b-2: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na yod sa
T03D3806:230b-3: na rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i dpes
T03D3806:230b-4: yum spyod sa na lta spyod rin po che thams
T03D3806:230b-6: rgyal po brten mi rim gro thob pa'i dpes yum rgyal po dang 'dra /
T03D3806:230b-7: sku gdung rgyal po la brten pa'i mi dang 'dra bar bstan /
T03D3806:230b-8: rin po che ga'u tog gi nang du bcug nas bton pa'i dpes yum rin po che dang 'dra /
T03D3806:230b-9: sku gdung rin po che'i snod rnying pa dang mtshungs par bstan /
T03D3806:230b-10: shing rnams lo ma dang me tog tha dad kyi
T03D3806:230b-11: grib ma la dbyer med pa'i dpes sde snod kyi
T03D3806:230b-12: chos thams cad tshul gcig par bstan to //
T03D3806:230b-13: mos pa byed du 'jug pa'i dpe gsum ni /
T03D3806:230b-14: myu gu med na sdong bu med pa'i dpes byang
T03D3806:230b-15: chub kyi sems med na mngon mtho dang nges legs
T03D3806:230b-16: kyi bde ba mi 'byung bar bstan /
T03D3806:230b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed pa'i
T03D3806:230b-18: sems can las byed pa rnams brtson pa'i dpes shes
T03D3806:230b-19: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yum yod na
T03D3806:230b-20: sdig pa spang zhing dge ba sgrub par bstan /
T03D3806:230b-21: ma dros gnas pa'i klu'i bdag po med na chu
T03D3806:230b-22: klung dang rtsi shing nags tshal la sogs pa mi
T03D3806:230b-23: 'byung ba'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3806:230b-24: pa med na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
T03D3806:230b-25: shes med pas nges par legs pa byang chub rnam
T03D3806:230b-26: pa gsum dang / mngon par mtho ba'i chos mi 'byung bar bstan to //
T03D3806:230b-27: snang byed thams cad pas nyi ma'i 'od zer mchog
T03D3806:230b-28: tu bzhag pa'i dpes nyan thos la sogs pa'i bsod
T03D3806:230b-29: nams byas pa'i dngos po bas byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3806:230b-30: rjes su yi rang bsod nams khyad par 'phags par
T03D3806:230b-31: bstan / dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas kyi dpes
T03D3806:230b-32: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mthar
T03D3806:230b-34: dmus long dmigs bu med pa'i dpes shes rab kyi
T03D3806:230b-35: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang spyan dang
T03D3806:230b-36: 'dra bar bstan / zong zad slar log na mi
T03D3806:230b-37: rung ba'i dpes dal 'byor gyi zong zad nas ngan
T03D3806:230b-39: nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te dbyer med gcad du
T03D3806:230b-40: med pa'i dpes gzugs la sogs pa'i 'khor 'das kyi
T03D3806:230b-41: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pas dag par bstan
T03D3806:230b-42: te // gzhi shes kyi dpe drug las /
T03D3806:230b-43: 'khor ba'i dpe gsum ni 'dam la zin pa'i dpes
T03D3806:230b-44: ming dang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la chags
T03D3806:231a-0: pa bstan / rlung gi 'khor lo'i dpes khams @231a * //
T03D3806:231a-1: gsum du 'khyams shing rgyud drug tu 'khor ba bstan /
T03D3806:231a-2: ri dags rgyar chud kyi dpes sems can skye rgas na 'chi'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar bstan /
T03D3806:231a-3: nam mkha' la bya 'phur ba'i dpes rigs kyi bu shes rab dang ldan pa /
T03D3806:231a-4: dngos po yod med kyi mtha' las mi 'chor bar bstan /
T03D3806:231a-5: nyi ma gza' dang bral ba lhang nge 'dug pa'i
T03D3806:231a-6: dpes gzugs la sogs pa'i chos dang chos can gyis
T03D3806:231a-8: me btang nas rtsva shing thams cad sreg par byed
T03D3806:231a-9: pa'i dpes spang bya dang gnyen po thams cad las
T03D3806:231a-10: grol nas gang la yang rlom sems mi byed par
T03D3806:231a-11: bstan to // rnam kun mngon rdzogs la dpe sum cu rtsa dgu las /
T03D3806:231a-13: chos 'di sprul pa dang sgyu ma 'dra shes kyi dpes snang ba 'khrul snang du bstan /
T03D3806:231a-14: dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por phyin pa'i
T03D3806:231a-15: dpes 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba la sogs pa'i byed
T03D3806:231a-16: pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi grong khyer du phyin pa'i
T03D3806:231a-17: rtags su bstan / rgya mtsho chen po lta ru
T03D3806:231a-18: 'gro ba la rtags ma mthong ba rgya mtsho chen
T03D3806:231a-19: po nye ba'i rtags kyi dpes mi dge ba la
T03D3806:231a-20: sogs pa'i rtags med pa byang chub thob pa'i rtags
T03D3806:231a-21: rtags su bstan / su bstan / dpyid dus kyi
T03D3806:231a-22: rtsi shing kha 'bus na lo 'bras me tog 'byung
T03D3806:231a-23: ba shes pa'i dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3806:231a-24: phyin pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed na myur
T03D3806:231a-25: du bde legs thams cad 'byung bar bstan /
T03D3806:231a-26: sbrum ma zla ba tshang ba'i dpes snang ba bkrag
T03D3806:231a-27: chung ngu song tsam na myur du sangs rgyas par
T03D3806:231a-28: bstan to // bar chad kyi dpe lnga ni /
T03D3806:231a-29: glog bzhin myur du nyams pa'i dpes brtan pa chung bas phan mi thogs par bstan /
T03D3806:231a-30: mi shes de dag rtsa ba bor nas rmongs pa
T03D3806:231a-31: yal ga dag dang 'dab ma tshol ba'i dpes shes
T03D3806:231a-32: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don sems nyid
T03D3806:231a-33: kyi don bor nas theg pa chung ngu'i mdo slob
T03D3806:231a-35: glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes tshol gyi dpes
T03D3806:231a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnyed nas
T03D3806:231a-37: sgra dang tshad ma la sogs pa tha snyad slob
T03D3806:231a-39: zas mchog rnyed nas zas ngan tshol bar byed pa'i
T03D3806:231a-40: dpes mnyam gzhag la sems brtan nas lus ngag gis
T03D3806:231a-41: dge ba la 'bad pa 'khrul bar bstan /
T03D3806:231a-42: rin po che la dgra 'byung ba'i dpes zab mo
T03D3806:231a-43: la bar chad 'ong ba mi 'gal bar bstan to
T03D3806:231a-44: // mtshan nyid kyi dpe ma zhig na bar gyur
T03D3806:231a-45: la bu ni mang yod kyi dpes dus gsum gyi
T03D3806:231b-0: sangs rgyas thams @231b cad 'di las 'byung bas yum
T03D3806:231b-1: dang sras su sgrub pa bstan /
T03D3806:231b-2: shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dpe bzhi ni /
T03D3806:231b-3: dga' ba'i tshal gyi dpes sems can ngan song gi
T03D3806:231b-4: sdug bsngal las 'don kyang sems can du mi dmigs
T03D3806:231b-5: pa dang / seng ge ri sul gyi dpes bdag
T03D3806:231b-6: med seng ge'i sgras bdag tu lta ba spong zhing
T03D3806:231b-7: byang chub sems dpa' la nyam nga ba med par
T03D3806:231b-8: pa dang / bstan / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis
T03D3806:231b-9: sa skems shing gzugs rnams ston pa'i dpes srid pa'i
T03D3806:231b-10: chu bo skems shing 'khor gyi chos snang ba dang
T03D3806:231b-11: pa dang / bstan / / nam mkha' mthong zhes
T03D3806:231b-12: sems can tshig tu rab brjod kyi dpes gang yang
T03D3806:231b-13: mthong ba med pa chos nyid kyi don mthong bar
T03D3806:231b-14: pa dang / bstan / / bstan to // khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi dpe drug ni /
T03D3806:231b-15: rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor du mi
T03D3806:231b-16: 'gro bar rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad
T03D3806:231b-17: sdud pa'i dpes sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
T03D3806:231b-18: sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan thams cad
T03D3806:231b-19: 'byung bar bstan / rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing
T03D3806:231b-20: blon po kun byed kyi dpes sangs rgyas kyi phrin
T03D3806:231b-21: las thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3806:231b-23: rgya mtshor gru zhig na mi ro dang rkyal pa
T03D3806:231b-24: la mi 'ju ba dang 'jus pa'i dpes shes rab
T03D3806:231b-25: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa la sogs
T03D3806:231b-26: pa mi byed na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las mi
T03D3806:231b-27: thar 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed na thar par
T03D3806:231b-28: bstan / bum pa so btang ba dang ma btang
T03D3806:231b-29: ba chus reg pa'i dpes byang chub kyi mchog tu
T03D3806:231b-30: sems ma bskyed pa dang bskyed pa mi 'grol ba
T03D3806:231b-32: gru zag lhan ma byas pa dang byas pa'i dpes
T03D3806:231b-33: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa dang mi
T03D3806:231b-34: gnas pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las thar pa dang
T03D3806:231b-36: mi rgas pa g-yas g-yon gnyis nas mis brten pa
T03D3806:231b-37: dang ma brten pa'i dpes thabs dang shes rab kyis
T03D3806:231b-38: zin pa dang ma zin na bdag gzhan gyi don
T03D3806:231b-40: nam mkha'i khams ni shar phyogs dang zhes bya ba
T03D3806:231b-41: la sogs pa'i dpes chos nyid phyogs dang ris su
T03D3806:231b-43: bya zhig lus ched dpag tshad la sogs pa'i dpes
T03D3806:231b-44: thabs shes rab 'bring gis rtogs pa dka' sla bstan
T03D3806:231b-45: to // bsgom lam las phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi dpe drug ni /
T03D3806:231b-46: mdas rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol ba'i dpes so sor
T03D3806:231b-47: rtog pa'i shes rab kyi phung po la sogs pa'i
T03D3806:232a-2: 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu'i rnam par
T03D3806:232a-3: rtog pa'i dpes ma g-yengs par rang gis gsal btab
T03D3806:232a-4: pa rgyud la goms dgos par bstan /
T03D3806:232a-5: bsod nams de yang gsog gsob dang snying po med
T03D3806:232a-6: pa'i dpes mngon par 'du byas pa'i dge ba la
T03D3806:232a-8: 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba'i dpes byang chub kyi sems rten 'brel yin pas zab par bstan /
T03D3806:232a-9: sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung de yang 'gags
T03D3806:232a-10: la sogs pas nyon mongs pa 'gags pa med par
T03D3806:232a-11: zab par bstan / chu'i thigs pa bum pa dang
T03D3806:232a-12: po tha ma'i bar gyis dge ba rim gyis sogs
T03D3806:232a-13: zab par bstan / par bstan / mnyen pa mkhas
T03D3806:232a-14: pa phar 'gro tshur 'gro byed kyang mi gnas pa'i
T03D3806:232a-15: dpes srid pa dang zhi ba ma grub kyang dmigs
T03D3806:232a-16: pa can la las 'bras yod par bstan to //
T03D3806:232a-17: thabs la mkhas pa'i dpe dgu ni /
T03D3806:232a-18: skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan gyi dpes
T03D3806:232a-19: spang bya sgyu ma la gnyen po sgyu ma bstan
T03D3806:232a-20: / mkha' la rlung rten gyi dpes chos thams cad gzhi rtsa ba med par bstan /
T03D3806:232a-21: nam mkhar gnas pa'i byas la mi ltung ba'i dpes thabs dngos por mi 'char bar bstan /
T03D3806:232a-22: 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mda' 'phangs kyi dpes
T03D3806:232a-23: tshogs sogs pa stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i thabs su
T03D3806:232a-24: bstan / dge slong rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i dpes stong
T03D3806:232a-25: nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi
T03D3806:232a-26: don la skyo ba med pa'i thabs su bstan /
T03D3806:232a-27: lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyis 'dzin pa'i dpes thabs
T03D3806:232a-28: shes rab dang ldan pas 'khor ba'i g-yang sar mi
T03D3806:232a-29: ltung bar bstan / rin po che blan zhing gnyen
T03D3806:232a-30: la mi ster ba rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i
T03D3806:232a-31: dpes bdag nyid stong nyid rtogs nas sems can stong
T03D3806:232a-32: pa nyid la dgod pa'i thabs bstan /
T03D3806:232a-33: ded dpon tshong pa rgyu bar shes par bya ba'i
T03D3806:232a-34: phyir grong khyer la sogs par goms par byed pa'i
T03D3806:232a-35: dpes 'dus byas thams cad sems can gzhan gyi chos
T03D3806:232a-36: nyid rtogs pa'i thabs su bstan /
T03D3806:232a-37: sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin pa'i dpes
T03D3806:232a-38: rnam thar sgo gsum dngos por ma grub kyang sems
T03D3806:232a-39: can gyi don du 'gro bar bstan no //
T03D3806:232a-40: rtse mo'i dpe sum cu rtsa gcig las /
T03D3806:232a-41: rtags kyi dpe gsum ni mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste /
T03D3806:232a-42: nad pa'i tshogs kyis sman pa sten pa ltar gyi
T03D3806:232a-43: dpes dug gsum zhi bar 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes
T03D3806:232b-0: gnyen gus pa'i @232b sgo nas bsten pa bstan /
T03D3806:232b-1: byis pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la mdud pa
T03D3806:232b-2: bor ba'i dpes 'khor bar 'ching ba ma grub par
T03D3806:232b-3: bstan / dug de khong du song ba med kyang
T03D3806:232b-4: brgyal bar 'gyur gyi dpes rang bzhin med pa la
T03D3806:232b-5: bdag tu bzung bas skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal
T03D3806:232b-7: rnam par 'phel ba'i dpe bdun ni /
T03D3806:232b-8: rin po che rnyed nas bag med pas stor na
T03D3806:232b-9: mya ngan gyi gdung ba 'byung ba'i dpes shes rab
T03D3806:232b-10: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dor bar bstan
T03D3806:232b-11: // nyi ma sprin med kyi 'od zer gyis snang
T03D3806:232b-12: ba gzhan zil gyis gnon cing mun pa 'joms pa'i
T03D3806:232b-13: dpes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dge
T03D3806:232b-14: ba bcu la sogs pa zil gyis gnon cing ma
T03D3806:232b-15: rig pa'i mun pa 'joms par bstan /
T03D3806:232b-16: rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod kyi dpes
T03D3806:232b-17: lha dang mi thams cad rigs kyi bu de la
T03D3806:232b-18: mos par bstan / sha za 'dra ba'i dpes byang
T03D3806:232b-19: chub sems dpa' nang rtsod pa la sogs pa byed
T03D3806:232b-20: na rtsod pa'i dus de nyid na yi dgas dang
T03D3806:232b-21: mos par bstan / 'dra bar bstan / nyi ma
T03D3806:232b-22: mkha' la 'gro ba'i 'od zer gyis non na mun
T03D3806:232b-23: pa med pa'i dpes rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi
T03D3806:232b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dge
T03D3806:232b-25: ba la mi dge ba mi 'byung bar bstan /
T03D3806:232b-26: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis 'jig tshogs su 'dus
T03D3806:232b-27: pa rjes su 'gro ba'i dpes srog gi dbang po
T03D3806:232b-28: 'gags na dbang po thams cad 'gag pa ldog pa'i
T03D3806:232b-29: dpes dge ba'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha
T03D3806:232b-30: rol tu phyin par 'dus par bstan to //
T03D3806:232b-31: rnam par mi rtog pa'i dpe bzhi ni /
T03D3806:232b-32: nam mkha' dang nam mkha' mi 'gal ba'i dpes rang
T03D3806:232b-33: gi ngo bo la rnam par mi rtog par bstan
T03D3806:232b-34: / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dpes bya ba la mi rtog pa bstan /
T03D3806:232b-35: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sems can gyi don byed
T03D3806:232b-36: kyang rang la dregs pa med pa'i dpes byed po
T03D3806:232b-38: shing gi 'khrul 'khor gyi dpes 'bras bu la mi rtog pa bstan to //
T03D3806:232b-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe brgyad la /
T03D3806:232b-40: bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa med pa'i chos nyid la mi gnas pa dang /
T03D3806:232b-41: rig sngags 'chang mkha' la rgyu ba'i dpes stong nyid kyi don rtogs pa dang /
T03D3806:232b-42: dus min me tog 'byung ba'i dpes sems nyid dag pa la phan yon 'byung ba dang /
T03D3806:232b-43: 'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang mi ltung ba'i dpes
T03D3806:232b-44: stong nyid rtogs kyang zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi
T03D3806:232b-45: 'gro ba dang / nya ni chu la gnas kyang
T03D3806:232b-46: 'tshubs nas mi 'chi ba'i dpes 'khor ba na gnas
T03D3806:233a-1: zad pa dang 'phel ba med pa'i dpes shes rab
T03D3806:233a-3: 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo'i dpes 'khor 'das gnyis ka rten 'brel gyi 'khrul pa yin pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-4: nyi ma sprin med kyis mun pa sel ba'i dpes rnam rtog ye shes su 'char ba'o //
T03D3806:233a-5: bsam gtan gyi dpe bzhi ni /
T03D3806:233a-6: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mis lha yul du phyin nas
T03D3806:233a-7: mi yul du mi chags pa'i dpes rigs kyi bu
T03D3806:233a-8: yum la spyod pa 'dod pa la mi zhen pa
T03D3806:233a-9: dang / chu nang padma'i dpes 'khor ba'i nang na gnas kyang de'i skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-10: rin po che rnyed nas de la ma zhen pa'i
T03D3806:233a-11: dpes bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob kyang de la
T03D3806:233a-12: yang dag tu mi 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-13: mnyen pa gru zhig gi dpes bsam gtan theg pa dman pa'i don du spyod pa'o //
T03D3806:233a-15: bran mo'i dpes nga rgyal med na brtson 'grus yin pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-16: rtsva dang shing las me byung ba'i dpes bde skyid rang gis sreg pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-17: bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro byed pa'i
T03D3806:233a-18: dpes sems can gyi don la mi skyo ba dang
T03D3806:233a-19: / gnam sa cha ral gyi dpes bdag dang lus
T03D3806:233a-20: bden par bzung na sems can gyi don mi 'grub
T03D3806:233a-21: / pa'o // sbyin pa'i dpe bzhi ni /
T03D3806:233a-22: bdag nyid yam brla dang 'dra ba'i dpes bdag nyid la 'phags pa med pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-23: gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa'ang mchil ma'i thal ba
T03D3806:233a-24: dang 'dra ba'i dpes longs spyod la ma chags pa
T03D3806:233a-25: dang / nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen po
T03D3806:233a-26: yang rin po che gcig gis zil gyis gnon pa'i
T03D3806:233a-27: dpes 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba thams cad byang
T03D3806:233a-28: chub tu sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang
T03D3806:233a-29: na zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T03D3806:233a-30: yon tan rin po che 'byung bas nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba'o //
T03D3806:233a-31: brtag pa mtha' gzung gi dpe brgyad ni /
T03D3806:233a-32: 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa mchod rten gyis bkang
T03D3806:233a-33: ba bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3806:233a-35: 'dzam bu'i gling sku gdung gis bkang ba bas shes
T03D3806:233a-36: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dam pa dang
T03D3806:233a-37: / 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa dgra bcom pa
T03D3806:233b-0: la bzhag pa bas kyang shes rab kyi @233b pha
T03D3806:233b-1: rol tu phyin pa byin na bsod nams che ba
T03D3806:233b-2: / dang / 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i sems
T03D3806:233b-3: can gnas pa la sbyin pa btang ba bas shes
T03D3806:233b-4: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsod nams che
T03D3806:233b-5: / dang / ba dang / stong gsum gyi ri
T03D3806:233b-6: rab srang la gzhal bar tshad gzung du nus kyi
T03D3806:233b-7: sems kun du gnas pa'i tshad gzung bar mi nus
T03D3806:233b-8: / dang / ba dang / pa dang / chu
T03D3806:233b-9: bo chen po gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T03D3806:233b-10: bdud sdig can du gyur nas ba spu nyag re
T03D3806:233b-11: re las de snyed sprul kyang bar chad bya bar
T03D3806:233b-13: stong gsum rin po ches bkang nas phul ba bas bzod pa la gnas pa lhag pa dang /
T03D3806:233b-14: srid pa gsum na sems can ji snyed yod pas
T03D3806:233b-15: rin po che sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs
T03D3806:233b-16: pa dang bcas pas phul ba bas dmigs pa med
T03D3806:233b-17: pa'i shes rab kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T03D3806:233b-18: mtshon pa dpe'i lde mig ste gsum pa'o /
T03D3806:233b-20: // / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshigs
T03D3806:233b-21: su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa dgu las dang po
T03D3806:233b-22: sngon byung la tshigs su bcad pa gcig / sems
T03D3806:233b-23: bskyed kyi ngo bo la gcig / dpe la gcig
T03D3806:233b-24: / don la gcig / rgyu mtshan la gcig ste
T03D3806:233b-26: gdams ngag la gcig / nges 'byed la bcu las
T03D3806:233b-27: drod dang rtse mo la tshigs su bcad pa gsum
T03D3806:233b-29: chos mchog la gcig / nges 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin mjug bsdu ba la gcig ste mdun no //
T03D3806:233b-30: gzung rtog la gcig /'dzin rtog la gcig / yongs su 'dzin pa la gcig ste bcu'o //
T03D3806:233b-33: ched du bya ba la gcig / go cha 'jug
T03D3806:233b-34: pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshogs la
T03D3806:233b-35: gcig / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs la
T03D3806:233b-36: gcig / zung du 'brel ba'i tshogs la gcig /
T03D3806:233b-37: thabs la mkhas pa la sogs pa bdun gyi tshogs
T03D3806:233b-38: la gcig / nges 'byung gi sgrub pa la bdun
T03D3806:233b-39: las ched du bya ba dang /
T03D3806:233b-42: lhun gyis grub pa'i nges 'byung bzhi la gcig / shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03D3806:233b-43: thob pa'i nges 'byung gnyis la gcig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nges 'byung la gsum /
T03D3806:234a-1: 'byung la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis /
T03D3806:234a-2: lam shes pa la tshigs su bcad pa lnga bcu
T03D3806:234a-3: rtsa bzhi las dang po ji ltar gnas pa la
T03D3806:234a-5: ji ltar bslab pa la lnga /
T03D3806:234a-6: mthong lam gyi ye shes btsal na ma rnyed ba
T03D3806:234a-7: la gcig / de'i phan yon dang bsgom lam gyi
T03D3806:234a-9: mos pa yid la byed pa la bcu bzhi yod
T03D3806:234a-10: pa las rang gi don du mos pa la gsum
T03D3806:234a-11: / gnyis ka'i don du mos pa la bzhi /
T03D3806:234a-12: gzhan gyi don du mos pa la bdun no //
T03D3806:234a-13: gzhan mos pa byed du 'jug pa la brgyad /
T03D3806:234a-14: rjes su yi rang ba la gnyis /
T03D3806:234a-15: bsngo ba la brgyad las khyad par gyi bsngo ba la bzhi /
T03D3806:234a-16: mi dmigs pa dang phyin ci ma log pa gnyis
T03D3806:234a-17: la gcig / thabs la mkhas pa dang mtshan ma
T03D3806:234a-18: med par bsngo ba la gcig / sangs rgyas kyis
T03D3806:234a-19: gnad ba'i bsngo ba la gcig / bsod nams che
T03D3806:234a-20: 'byung gi bsngo ba la gcig / sgrub pa la
T03D3806:234a-21: bzhi / rnam dag skye ba'i rgyu la gcig / mi skye ba'i rgyu la gnyis /
T03D3806:234a-22: rnam dag dngos la gcig go //
T03D3806:234a-23: gzhi shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo la gcig /
T03D3806:234a-24: thabs kyi nye ring dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzhi
T03D3806:234a-25: la gcig / sbyor ba la gcig / rnam pa
T03D3806:234a-26: la gcig / nyan thos la sogs pa'i mthong lam
T03D3806:234a-27: la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste lnga'o //
T03D3806:234a-28: rnam kun mngon rdzogs la tshigs su bcad pa dgu bcu rtsa bdun las /
T03D3806:234a-29: dang po skyor ba la bcu ni chos nyid kyi
T03D3806:234a-30: sbyor ba lnga la gcig / tshogs chen po yun
T03D3806:234a-31: ring pos thob pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T03D3806:234a-33: phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang gsum la gcig / gnas 'byung la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234a-34: bar chad med pa la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234a-35: byang chub nye ba la gcig / myur ba la
T03D3806:234a-36: gcig /'phel 'grib med pa dang chos dang ches ma
T03D3806:234a-37: yin pa mi mthong ba gnyis la gcig / rnam
T03D3806:234a-39: yon tan bcu bzhi la gcig go //
T03D3806:234a-40: skyon la tshigs su bcad pa bcu las skyon spyir
T03D3806:234a-41: dris pa la tshigs su bcad pa gcig / tshogs
T03D3806:234a-42: chen pos yun ring por dang /
T03D3806:234a-43: spobs pa ha cang myur ba dang /
T03D3806:234a-44: lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /
T03D3806:234a-45: sems kyi gnas ngan len dang /
T03D3806:234a-46: rigs pa ma yin pas skyed pa'i kha ton la
T03D3806:234a-47: sogs pa lnga la gcig / phyir phyogs pa'i rgyu
T03D3806:234b-0: @234b mtshan la gcig / rgyu la mngon par zhen
T03D3806:234b-2: theg pa mchog la nyams pa gnyis la gcig /
T03D3806:234b-3: ro mchog la nyams pa la gcig / rnyed pa
T03D3806:234b-4: dang bkur sti la chags pas nyams pa la gcig
T03D3806:234b-5: / slob dpon dang slob ma mi mthun pas nyams
T03D3806:234b-6: pa la gcig / skyon gyi rnam pa gzhan bstan
T03D3806:234b-7: pa la gcig / yon tan can la bar chod
T03D3806:234b-8: 'byung bar bstan pa la gcig / mos gus can
T03D3806:234b-9: la bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa la gcig ste
T03D3806:234b-10: bcu'o // mtshan nyid la tshigs su bcad pa sum
T03D3806:234b-11: cu las mtshan nyid sbyor bstan pa la gcig /
T03D3806:234b-12: shes pa'i mtshan nyid la brgyad las gzhi shes pa
T03D3806:234b-13: bcu'o // la gnyis / lam shes pa la gcig
T03D3806:234b-14: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la lnga'o
T03D3806:234b-15: bcu'o // la gnyis / // khyad par gyi mtshan
T03D3806:234b-16: nyid la bcu bzhi las dge ba thams cad sdud
T03D3806:234b-17: pa la gcig / byed pa la gcig / sgrub
T03D3806:234b-18: pa la gcig / dmigs pa la dpe don gnyis
T03D3806:234b-19: bcu'o // la gnyis / // / rten la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-20: mtha' dag la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-21: yongs su 'dzin pa la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-22: ro myong ba med pa la gsum mo //
T03D3806:234b-23: byed pa la gcig / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid la drug ste sum cu'o //
T03D3806:234b-24: thar pa'i cha mthun la gsum /
T03D3806:234b-25: nges par 'byed pa la gcig / sbyor lam dang mthong lam gyi rtags la bdun /
T03D3806:234b-26: bsgom lam las phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags la bcu gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-27: chos sku la dpe don gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-28: zhing dag pa la gcig / sems can gyi don
T03D3806:234b-29: du thabs la mkhas pa la tshigs su bcad pa
T03D3806:234b-31: rtse mo mngon par rtogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa brgya dang dgu ston pa las /
T03D3806:234b-32: rtags la bco brgyad ni phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags la gsum /
T03D3806:234b-33: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i rtags la brgyad las /
T03D3806:234b-34: yon tan gyi gzhi las byung ba la gcig / ming gi gzhi las byung ba la gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-35: dben pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i bdud kyi las la lnga /
T03D3806:234b-36: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-37: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis /
T03D3806:234b-38: 'khor 'das la ma zhen pa la gsum ste bco brgyad do //
T03D3806:234b-39: rnam par 'phel ba la nyi shu gcig gis ston
T03D3806:234b-40: pa la 'dzam bu'i gling du dge ba bcu la
T03D3806:234b-41: sogs pa pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3806:235a-0: @235a * // pa mthun par byed pa bsod nams che ba la gsum /
T03D3806:235a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang mi 'gal ba la gsum /
T03D3806:235a-2: dge ba bcu las khyad par du 'phags pa la gnyis /
T03D3806:235a-3: lha'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'ong ba la gnyis /
T03D3806:235a-4: bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la drug / bslab pa rnam par dag pa la gnyis /
T03D3806:235a-5: mi dge ba la sogs pa'i go mi 'byed pa
T03D3806:235a-6: la gcig / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
T03D3806:235a-7: 'dus pa la gnyis te nyi shu rtsa gcig go
T03D3806:235a-8: // nges pa la gcig / kun tu gnas pa la gnyis /
T03D3806:235a-9: rnam par mi rtog pa la drug / mi rtog pa'i phan yon la bzhi ste bcu'o //
T03D3806:235a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshigs su bcad pa bcu gsum /
T03D3806:235a-11: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bcu /
T03D3806:235a-12: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bcu
T03D3806:235a-13: gcig / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3806:235a-14: bdun / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyed dang dgu /
T03D3806:235a-15: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang brgyad do //
T03D3806:235a-16: mthar gyis pa la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi las /
T03D3806:235a-17: sbyin pa la gcig / tshul khrims dang bzod pa
T03D3806:235a-18: la gcig / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan la gcig
T03D3806:235a-20: skad cig ma la rkang pa gcig go //
T03D3806:235a-21: chos sku la rkang pa gsum /
T03D3806:235a-22: mdo yon tan rin po che don dang ldan pa'i mtshan bstan pa la gcig go //
T03D3806:235a-23: rjod par byed pa'i tshig phul gdab pa'i lde mig ste bzhi pa'o //
T03D3806:235a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod kyi
T03D3806:235a-25: lde mig ces bya ba kha che'i mkhan po bla
T03D3806:235a-26: ma dha rma shr'is mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3806:235a-29: byang chub sa'i snying po dpal /
T03D3806:235a-30: 'bum stengs kyi gtsug lag khang gsar du bzhengs pa'i dus su /
T03D3806:235a-31: slob dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang gdan 'dzom nas /
T03D3806:235a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsgyur cing bka' stsal te /
T03D3806:235a-33: ston sgom sbag ma gsum gyis zhu ba phul /
T03D3806:235a-34: dge slong dri ma med pas yon bdag mdzad nas /
